content: darn knit rasta hat by aimee pelletier don t think you re a hat person think again this hat looks great on everyone instructions materials us15 16 circular needles co 42 stitches place marker us15 double pointed needles join in the round being careful 1 skein malabrigo rasta or similar bulky not to twist sts yarn tapestry needle rounds 1-5 knit gauge rounds 6-12 *yo k2tog repeat from * to end of round 2 sts per 1 inch rounds 13-18 knit abbreviations rounds 19-26 *yo k2tog repeat from * to end of round co=cast on bobble=bind off yo=yarn over- wrap yarn around right decrease k2tog until 8 sts needle remain switch to double k2tog= knit 2 stitches together pointed needles when needed sts=stitches break yarn and draw through remaining sts weave in ends
